user.title: Set up Paw Control
user.description:
Welcome to Paw Control! Let's set up smart dog management for your Home Assistant.

This integration will help you track feeding, walks, health, and GPS location for your dogs.

configure_external_entities.title: Configure External Entities
configure_external_entities.description:
üîó **External Entity Configuration**

Paw Control needs to connect to existing Home Assistant entities for full functionality. This step is required for Platinum quality compliance.

**Required for GPS tracking:** Device tracker or Person entity
**Optional for visitor detection:** Door sensor
**Optional for notifications:** Custom notification service

‚ö†Ô∏è If no entities are available, you can configure them manually later.
